Room.Name: A Gravel Road in the Graveyard
Room.Description: You are on a well-kept gravel road that leads north-south through the graveyard. On both sides of the road grow dark evergreen trees. An iron grate is to the north and narrow gravel paths lead east and west.

Exit.Description: Through the solid iron bars you see Elm Street.
The gravel path leads eastwards between the dark evergreen trees.
The gravel path leads westwards between the dark evergreen trees.

Room.Name: A Gravel Road in the Graveyard
Room.Description: You are on a well-kept gravel road that leads north-south through the graveyard. On both sides of the road grow dark evergreen trees.

Room.Name: A Gravel Road in the Graveyard
Room.Description: You are on a well-kept gravel road that leads north-south through the graveyard. On both sides of the road grow dark evergreen trees.

Room.Name: A Gravel Road in the Graveyard
Room.Description: You are on a well-kept gravel road that leads north-south through the graveyard. On both sides of the road grow dark evergreen trees.

Exit.Description: The gravel road continues southwards to an open space before a small building.

Room.Name: In front of the Chapel
Room.Description: You are on an open space before a small chapel. A gravel road leads north through the graveyard and the chapel entrance is to the south.

Exit.Description: The gravel path leads eastwards between the dark evergreen trees.
The chapel door is made of dark wood.
The gravel path leads westwards between the dark evergreen trees.

Room.Name: A Gravel Path on the Graveyard
Room.Description: You are on a gravel path winding its way between dark evergreen trees on the graveyard. An old tomb is here.

Exit.Description: The gravel path continues eastwards towards a gravel road.

ExtraDescription.Description: It is a large rectangular slab of dark grey stone that has been placed face up in the ground. The name has been erased by the ravages of time.

Room.Name: In a dusty Tomb
Room.Description: You are in a dark burial chamber beneath a large tomb stone. The only exit appears to be up.

Room.Name: A Gravel Path on the Graveyard

ExtraDescription.Description: It is a large rectangular slab of dark grey stone that has been placed face up in the ground. The name has been erased by the ravages of time.

Room.Name: A Gravel Path on the Graveyard
Room.Description: You are on a gravel path winding its way between dark evergreen trees on the graveyard. The path leads north and east. A small shed is to the west.

Exit.Description: It is a small black-painted shed with a wooden door.

Room.Name: In a shed on the Graveyard
Room.Description: You are in a small shed that looks as if it is used to store all sorts of gardening equipment. The only exit appears to be through a door to the east.

Room.Name: A Gravel Path on the Graveyard
Room.Description: You are on a gravel path winding its way between dark evergreen trees on the graveyard. The path leads south and west. An old tomb is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It is a large rectangular slab of dark grey stone that has been placed face up in the ground. The name has been erased by the ravages of time.

Room.Description: You are in a dark burial chamber beneath a large tomb stone. The only exit appears to be up.

NPC.name: henry gardener
NPC.description: He is a tall but bulky man in his late fifties. His features are worn with decades of hard work and his somewhat crouched expression is one of deep sorrow and depression. He is haunted by a memory of a lost paradise.
NPC.longDescription: Henry the Gardener is sitting here, looking drunk.

NPC.name: zombie
NPC.description: Maggots crawl all over its decaying body.
NPC.longDescription: A rotting zombie is staggering towards you with outstretched hands.

NPC.name: ghoul
NPC.description: It is a walking corpse with long fangs and long, sharp nails that most of resemble claws. Its eyes are a dark yellow colour and glare hungrily at you.

NPC.name: skeleton
NPC.description: The dusty bones are almost brown. It must have been buried for a very long time.

NPC.name: skeleton
NPC.description: The dusty bones are almost brown. It must have been buried for a very long time.

NPC.name: zombie
NPC.description: Maggots crawl all over its decaying body.
NPC.longDescription: A rotting zombie is staggering towards you with outstretched hands.

Item.Name: candlestick
Item.LongDescription: A pewter candlestick is standing here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It is a rather old-looking three-armed candlestick made from pewter. Its candles are a yellowish white colour.

Item.Name: brandy bottle
Item.LongDescription: A brandy bottle is lying here.

ExtraDescription.Description: The bottle is a special 'Dragon Blood' brandy bottle. Its neck is shaped like a small dragon's head. Bottles like these are often worth a small amount money, even when empty.

Item.Name: brandy bottle
Item.LongDescription: A brandy bottle is lying here.

ExtraDescription.Description: The bottle is a special 'Dragon Blood' brandy bottle. Its neck is shaped like a small dragon's head. Bottles like these are often worth some money, even when empty.

Item.Name: wheelbarrow
Item.LongDescription: A green-painted wheelbarrow is standing here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It is a heavy wheelbarrow made from solid oaken planks that have been painted a dark, green colour.
It is a large metal shovel with a solid wooden handle.
It is a large metal rake with a solid wooden handle.
The dusty bones are almost brown. It must have been buried for a very long time. A dusty skeleton is in an excellent condition.

Item.Name: amethyst gem
Item.LongDescription: A large, beautifully polished amethyst has been left here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It has a very deep purple colour.

Item.Name: pendant silver
Item.LongDescription: A silver pendant has been left here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It resembles Thor's hammer and appears to be made of solid silver.

Item.Name: dagger silver
Item.LongDescription: A long silver dagger is lying here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It has a long, sharp blade that is made entirely from silver. A small rune has been engraved on the blade next to the hilt.
